s.text: They tell us what to see, where to start, and-this is very important-what to do in case we lose a wallet or rupture an appendix.
Our kids will probably hit the road with Palm Pilot XXVIIs stuffed in their backpacks.
I know our dialogue is over, but I still wish I could ask you where you're going next and which of these guides you would bring along.
